segments.text: This is Mr Brown speaking . I'd like to speak to Mr . Thomas , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but Mr.Thomas left the office a few minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's bad ! I've been trying to call him for the last ten minutes , but your line has been busy.Will he be back soon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not.He ' s gone for the rest of the day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anywhere I can reach him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't believe so.He ' s going out of town on business.May I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a business appointment with him for tomorrow morning at ten o'clock , but I'm afraid I can't make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you care to make another appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , I'm leaving town rather unexpectedly , and I may be gone for several days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I can tell Mr.Thomas that you phoned .
segments.speaker: S1
